post.title: klipsch f2,c2,b2 vs tannoy f4,fc,fr. which one is better for movie?
post.content: option 1 hxxp://www.klipsch.com/world/as/en/products/details/f-2-home-theater-system.aspx f2 (front) c2(center) b2(rear) option2 tannoy mercury f4(front), fc(center), fr (rear) please help me choose the better one for movie. thanks a lot.
